p: Dichloromethane was obtained from Avantor Performance Materials Poland S.A. company (purity 99.8%). The standard substances (linalool, linalyl acetate, lavandulyl acetate, (-)-bornyl acetate, (-)-trans-caryophyllene, and geraniol) had a purity of 93.0 to 99.3% and were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Sp. Z o.o. (Poznan, Poland). Two lavender oils were analyzed: the first one was our in-house preparation, developed at the Cracow University of Technology (LO-SM), and the second was commercially available lavender oil (LO-C).
